column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
column14: The color is much more  like a black or deep, deep purple. There is no filter on the photo. It is that dark. I tried to apply it thinking maybe the color would be lighter once it goes on, but it was too thick and dry to even apply. It almost seemed like the lipstick I’ve kept under my sink for two years thinking one day I’ll use it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020
column14: Felt like Cruella Deville. Returned it. Why Mac always discontinues the exact color I loved. In my case, Viva Glam VI. If you are looking to find an alternative to VG6, this ain't it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2015
column14: I was surprised at how fast I received this item, first of all. I ordered this almost 4 days before Christmas and it arrived to days later. The color itself is gorgeous. It's a little darker than the picture but I blame that on my screen resolution. I love that the color doesn't bleed and can be worn with or without liner. It stays put and doesn't come off easily throughout the day. Unless you're doing a whole lot of lip-smacking, you my need to reapply maybe once or twice a day. The color is gorgeous and I'm a light, brown-skinned woman. Trust me, you'll love this seductive, deep red hue. It's a mysterious color and I love it!
